questions.question: What will happen if you try to access an index that is out of bounds in a Java array?
options: It prints an error and continues

questions.question: Which of the following correctly declares a 2D array in Java?

What does the following code display?

int[] nums = {5, 10, 15};
System.out.println(nums.length);
How can you copy one array to another in Java without using loops?

What does this code output?

int[] arr = new int[3];
arr[0] = 1;
arr[1] = 2;
arr[2] = 3;
for(int i=0; i<arr.length; i++) {
  arr[i] += i;
}
System.out.println(arr[2]);
What is the default value of elements in a newly created int array in Java?
Which statement is true about arrays in Java?
options: Arrays can store different types in the same array
Arrays cannot be passed to methods

questions.question: What happens if you try to assign an array of doubles to an array of ints?
options: It works if values are integers

questions.question:
What does this code display?

int[][] matrix = {{1,2},{3,4}};
System.out.println(matrix[1][0]);
Which method can be used to sort an array in Java?
